name: BellSounds
0:
”Alexa open Bell Sounds”
”Alexa ask Bell Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bell sounds
des:
Bell Sounds creates a peaceful ambiance of bells ringing. These rythmic tones are perfect for meditation or to add atmospheric sounds to a setting.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Bell Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
